main event: A passenger pilot reported a high flying object during an observation on June 21, 1959, in Chicago, Illinois.
interesting points: The sighting was not followed up after preliminary evaluation., The object was suggested to be a possible balloon based on pilot's characteristics., The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., The object was reported to be round and at an altitude of 1000 feet., The weather was clear during the observation.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], age 32, owner of an industrial supply company.
